data.name: Guardians of Holme
data.detailed_description:
During the last invasion of the Devil, it was the Heroes who saved the world. They left three guardian magic circle so that the Devil could not come again. However, the Devil sent his legions with the intention of destroying the magic circle, and the human's cities are in ruins. In order to resist the legions of the Devil who had come to the Royal City, guarding the last magic circle. The artisans of Holme have stepped forward, and the traps are their best weapons!

  • Combination of Deck Building Game, Roguelite and Tower Defense: the traps you can use will change depending on the choices you make in your adventure.

  • Optional difficult battles: High risk of course means high reward, depending on whether you have enough courage and strength.

  • A wide variety of Traps, Artifacts and Enemies make for a completely different experience every time you play.

  • Three characters with different skills and tactical styles.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10, 32/64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-760 (4 * 2800) or equivalent / AMD Athlon II X4 645 AM3 (4 * 3100) or equivalent
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6670, GeForce GTX 200 series with at least 1GB
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10, 32/64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K (4 * 3400) or equivalent / AMD FX-6350 (6 * 3900) or equivalent
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 (2048 MB) / Radeon HD 7970 (3072 MB)
  • Sound Card: Direct X 9.0c sound device
